name: Racing Tanks! (itch)
description:
Racing Tanks! is a local multiplayer game to challenge your friends in a very short race.
Choose between Darkar, the best number one soldier, or the cute and adorable general Skyty!
Get your gear ready in this exciting race!

Disclaimer:
This is an early ALPHA of the final game, so its mechanics might be slightly different in the future.
Found a bug? You can report it here!
[EN] https://forms.gle/sEFZZon4FdXqBhb47
[ES] https://forms.gle/7RNiDGgdBv4tcXCBA
